title.narrative: Ennery-Quinte Agricultural Intensification Project
N/A
N/A
Proyecto de Intensificación Agrícola Ennery-Quinte

description.narrative: La operación busca aumentar el ingreso y empleo de sus beneficiarios en la zona del proyecto Ennery-Quinte y al mismo tiempo la recuperación y disminución de riesgo de inundaciones y deslices futuros en la cuenca.

The operation seeks to increase the income and employment of beneficiaries in the Ennery-Quinte project area and at the same time reducing the risk of further flood and mudslide damage in the watershed.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERE DE L'AGRICULTURE DES RESOURCESNATURELLES ET DU DEVELOPPEMENT RURAL

activity-description.narrative: 1,410,000 successful tree grafts have been conducted in Ennery in 2009.
280 km of ravines have been fitted in Gonaïves and Ennery
A small irrigation area has been rehabilitated in Ennery.
